channel.title: BM:DM and my impressions so far
channel.description:
Hello, I'm NightMare and I've been playing Half-Life since 1999. I've been playing the pro mod called Adrenaline Gamer for years and I love Half-Life to this day, as do many others. I'm amazed to see the level of detail you guys put into this game throughout years of development and I look forward to seeing this game become a success. Here's some suggestions that I came up with today after a few hours of playing and reading similar threads that I hope helps.
Note: I will edit this thread to include additional issues as they arise.
Issues not addressed to my knowledge:
- Can't crouch while in the air. - rpg laser is off by default (it should be on.) Also, there is an increased delay upon firing compared to HLDM. - Gauss primary fire rate is noticeably slower than HLDM. - mp5 magazine capacity is 45, in HLDM it's 50. In HLDM, it spawns with 25 rounds which requires a reload to have 50 in the magazine. - No drop weapon bind. - No team location bind. - Ability to disable screen bobbing from side to side while moving. - Gluon splash damage is negligible or nonexistant. - Satchel throwing distance has been reduced. In HLDM, it can be thrown and detonated in the air.
Important known issues:
- Gauss jump is too powerful. (It should have a more steady and gradual charge to jump various distances.) - There is a charge delay after shooting the gauss secondary fire. After each shot, whether partial or full charge, the player should be able to recharge gauss immediatey for movement or shooting purposes. - No wallgauss. - Walk key doesn't work. - No bunnyhop. - Long jump cooldown isn't implemented in HLDM. This should be a server side setting that allows admins to choose to enable or disable and may vary based upon game mode. - No wall strafe. - No circle jump. - Crossbow isn't hitscan. - There needs to be customization options for crosshair. - Zoom style isn't the same as HLDM for the crossbow and magnum and there's no quickbow. Zooming should be instant at a fixed fov. - mp5 recoil isn't the same as HLDM. - Lacking game modes including Arena, Arcade, LTS, LMS, CTF, etc...
